p: The following parts of the ACSS were considered for validation: the questions (n=6) related to typical symptoms (ACSS-typical), the questions (n=3) on QoL (ACSS-QoL), and the questions (n=6) on changes in UTI symptoms (ACSS-dynamics) at a follow-up visit. The results were compared with the overall assessment by the patients and investigators to evaluate the efficacy of treatment with the investigational medicinal product.
